comments:
1. Create a Web project with an EAR project.
2. Copy a  jar file under the EAR project folder
3. The jar is shown in the Utility jar's of the EAR project in the Project 
navigator.
4. Go to the Web project, right click Properties-> and try to open Java Jar 
Dependencies page.

you will  get the  following exception
